TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SessionStateActions extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Identifies whether a session item from a data store is for a session that requires initialization.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The SessionStateActions enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.GetItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.GetItemExclusive%2A> methods of a <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase> implementation. When a session item is retrieved from the data store, the enumeration value indicates whether the session requires initialization or not based on a value stored with the data. The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.GetItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.GetItemExclusive%2A> methods set an `actions` parameter to a SessionStateActions enumeration value based on this value retrieved with the session item. If the value of the `actions` parameter is set to InitializeItem, the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule> initializes the session and executes the `Session_OnStart` event defined in the Global.asax file for the ASP.NET application. If the value of the `actions` parameter is None, no additional steps are taken for the current session.
A session item created by the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.CreateUninitializedItem%2A> method is created with a value indicating that the item requires initialization and that the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.GetItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.GetItemExclusive%2A> methods should set the `actions` parameter to InitializeItem.
## Examples For an example of a session-state store provider implementation that uses the SessionStateActions enumeration, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateActions InitializeItem = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The session item from the data store is for a session that requires initialization.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateActions None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: No initialization actions need to be performed by the calling code.
